muclient.script:
sub Moja_Kondycja(a, b, c) world.tell "Ja " select case c(2) case "w swietnej kondycji." world.note "7" case "w dobrym stanie." world.note "6" case "lekko ranny." world.note "5" case "lekko ranna." world.note "5" case "ranny." world.note "4" case "ranna." world.note "4" case "w zlej kondycji." world.note "3" case "ciezko ranny." world.note "2" case "ciezko ranna." world.note "2" case "ledwo zywy." world.note "paadaaam" case "ledwo zywa." world.note "padaam" end select end sub
sub Cudza_Kondycja(a, b, c) if c(2) = "Wyglada na to, ze" then world.note b exit sub end if world.tell c(2) & " " select case c(3) case "w swietnej kondycji." world.note "7" case "w dobrym stanie." world.note "6" case "lekko ranny." world.note "5" case "lekko ranna." world.note "5" case "lekko ranne." world.note "5" case "ranny." world.note "4" case "ranna." world.note "4" case "ranne." world.note "4" case "w zlej kondycji." world.note "3" case "ciezko ranny." world.note "2" case "ciezko ranna." world.note "2" case "ciezko ranne." world.note "2" case "ledwo zywy." world.note "1" case "ledwo zywa." world.note "1" case "ledwo zywe." world.note "1" end select end sub
